text: ID (slug - exactly the same used to name the .json file)
Email
What is the name of the dataset?
What is the link to the dataset?
Is the link to the dataset a unique and persistent identifier?
Describe it briefly
Which keywords best describe the dataset?
Who, or which organization, is the data owner?
Provide some contact information regarding the dataset
Country (or region) where the data was collected?
Was the data collected during the DigitAF project?
answers: No, it was collected within another project

text: Type of data?
Is the data confidential?
answers: Data embargo, i.e there are rules or limits on using, sharing, or spreading it

text: What is the usage rights license for the dataset?
If available, what was the year of release?
If known, in what year was it last updated?
Is there any barrier to accessing the data?
answers: No, direct download/access through a web link
Access to the data needs to be granted (e.g. dataset owner needs to give permission after user registration; dataset owner sends data after receiving a request email)
Access to the data is evaluated before being granted, due to ethical, legal or contractual constrains (e.g. privacy, highly sensitive data)

text: What is the format of the data?
answers: Widely used file formats (CSV, JSON, GeoJSON, XML, TIFF, MP3, MP4, etc.)
Custom file formats (database specific, not widely used)
Static content (e.g. textual, reports on website pages, tables and graphs, PDF files)

text: Does the metadata file follow any controlled vocabularies, keywords, thesauri or ontologies?
Is the dataset also listed in other databases?
The dataset has an associated metadata file (e.g. XML, md), where the dataset details are described?
Is the metadata file, or documentation, fully accessible, even if the data may not be publicly available?
It is clear how, why and by whom the data have been created and processed?
The data is accurate and well described with many relevant attributes?
Indicate the associated publication(s) or other documentation related with the dataset.
If applicable, in which DigitAF Living Labs is the data being used?
